text:
Emile Linus Alfred Wijntuin (22 September 1924 – 7 May 2020) was a Surinamese politician. He was the Chairman of the National Assembly of Suriname from 1975 until the aftermath of the 1980 Surinamese coup d'état.. Wijntuin was a member of the Progressive Surinamese People's Party. He was born in the Coronie District. He was the Chairman of the Staten of Suriname from 1973 to 1975.
Wijntuin died on 7 May 2020 at the age of 95.

annotations.surface_form: Chairman of the National Assembly of Suriname
Chairman of the Staten of Suriname
